title: Taiho Shichau zo: Full Throttle - Watashitachi no Iru Basho
synopsis: Rounding off season 3, Natsumi and Miyuki reminiscince about their lives at Bokuto station while hearing from people they've met through work. (This is limited to characters they've met in season 3.)
related_anime: ['Taiho Shichau zo: Full Throttle', 'Taiho Shichau zo']
